ratings.comment: Caitlyn was a great professor who did a great job getting her complex points across through lectures. There was a lot of homework, with assignments due MWF each week. However, she was always clear about expectations and timelines for what students should be doing.

I took 311 with her. What a lovely woman. Caitlin cares so much for all of her students and comes in to each class with a warm, genuine smile on her face. She is also very knowledgeable. Would definitely taking her classes. The only thing was that she doesn't have a natural knack for organization so that was a bit annoying at times.

I really liked this professor. In the past I've had really bad Spanish teachers and she was the complete opposite. I really enjoyed her class but get ready for lots of grammar work which is not my fave.

Spanish 361: Caitlin is a sweet professor and cares about her students. There are a lot of reading assignments and there are three one-page response papers, an individual presentation, and a final 5-page essay which was more than I was expecting, but she is there to help you along the way. Participation and attendance are graded.

She does not have full control over the course. I hate how the course is set up especially during a pandemic, there are not opportunities for extra credit and there are no assignments dropped. There is WAY too much homework where I hardly even try to take my time to complete because I am just rushing to get it all done, so I am not really learning.

Professor Beduhn is absolutely amazing! Had her for Spanish 1 this semester, and although there was a lot of homework, it was relatively easy to complete since we talked about everything in extensive detail during class! I feel like I actually learned the material super super well, and feel super confident going into Spanish 2 and 3 now.

Caitlin is AMAZING! She is patient, knowledgeable, and just genuinely sweet/caring. I loved having her as my Spanish teacher. I always felt challenged, but respected and positively encouraged to do my best. She was great at explaining tough concepts and was very accessible during office hours to help you revise an essay.

Caitlin was an awesome teacher! The class wasn't curved so I had to give consistent effort throughout the semester, but Caitlin always gave good feedback and wanted her students to succeed. Certainly not an easy A, but attainable with some work. Great teacher, and just a very nice person.

Caitlin is a great professor. She genuinely cares about her students and wants them to succeed. You can ask her anything and she is able to explain it in a variety of ways. She is all around great just as a person, and I'm very close with her even after the semester.

Senora Beduhn was a really great professor, she was always willing to help, and she taught us everything we needed to know in order to achieve good grades on the tests and quizzes. The class was challenging at times with trying to figure out the grammar, but all in all the class was easy and fun.
Young, interested, and knowledgeable. Easy to understand and comprehend. gives lots of examples and is considerate of students.

Caitlin is an AMAZING TA. She is there for you in every way that she can be and she really cares that everyone understands the material. She tries her best to make class exciting, and tries to be your friend. She isn't foreign so she's easy to understand. I would highly recommend having her for your TA.

She is an absolutely great teacher. She isn't foreign, so there isn't any lack of clarity or understanding. She speaks Spanish beautifully. She is always happy to answer questions and is very likable. Going to class was never a waste of my time. She was very well prepared with material and made class fun.
Amazing TA, and her tests were fairly easy.
She was very easy to understand. Answered questions to her best ability. Prepared students for tests well. One of the best TAs I've ever had.
